content.text: I'm doing some research on the benefits of owning a dog. Do you have any experience with this?
I grew up on a farm, so I've had dogs my whole life!
That's great! What kind of dogs did you have?
We had a lot of different breeds. My favorite was my Golden Retriever, Buddy.
I love Golden Retrievers! They're so friendly and sweet.
They are! Buddy was the best dog I ever had. I'm still sad that he passed away.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure he had a great life with you.
He did. He was always happy and loved to play.
What do you think are the best things about having a dog?
There are so many good things about having a dog! They're always there for you, they make you laugh, and they're great companions.
That's true! I love coming home to my dog after a long day. He always makes me feel better.
